= CombineArchive !JavaLibrary =

This is a Java library to read/write/create/manipulate/etc. !CombineArchives. To learn more about !CombineArchives visit [http://co.mbine.org/documents/archive co.mbine.org].


== Usage ==
* [http://bin.sems.uni-rostock.de/CombineArchive/ download a binary]
* include !CombineArchive via Maven: ([http://mvn.sems.uni-rostock.de/releases/de/unirostock/sems/CombineArchive find latest version id], import the [https://sems.uni-rostock.de/2013/10/maven-repository/ SEMS Maven repository])
{{{
#!xml
<dependency>
    <groupId>de.unirostock.sems</groupId>
    <artifactId>CombineArchive</artifactId>
    <version>$VERSION</version>
</dependency>
}}}
* learn HowTo use the library
* learn about [wiki:MetaDataObject]s

== Build ==

* learn how to BuildCombineArchive
